bibl.title: A Ptolemaic Demotic Account of Bread on an Ostracon (O. Al-Ashmunein Magazine Inv. No. 1130).
bibl.note: Uncovered by the archaeological mission of Cairo University working in Tuna al-Gebel necropolis under the leadership of S. Gabra. Late Ptolemaic period.

bibl.title: Annales du Service des antiquités d'Égypte
